text: I reached out with a similar request but didn't get the process to do so. Let me know if you come across a possible solution. Thanks.

Hi. Based on my current data, most of the buyers are from first world countries (majorly US). Germany is on the second spot. 
Theme is mostly purchased by Marketing Manager or Marketing Operation Manager or Marketing Coordinator profiles.
Hey Pawan — thanks so much for this — is this based upon your theme/marketplace sales?
If so — would you mind linking to what you have so I can check it out?
